question: Who was Lal Ded ?
option1: Lal Ded was a Bhakti Saint
option2: She was born near Pampore, Kashmir
option3: She was a devotee of Shiva
explanation: Lal Ded (Lalleswari) was a Kashmiri saint and an ardent devotee of Lord Shiva. She was a daughter of a Kashmiri Brahman, Cheta Bhat, born in 1320 AD near Pampore, Kashmir.
